data.speaker: Player
data.content: The answer is three! I can feel their poisonous lies burning my skin!

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I don't know which ones... but I know for sure that at least 2 of them are full of shit!

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I want to hear them scream as their canvas rips!
You're freaking me out a little bit... I hope you know what you're doing...
